dashboard.label: Druid Health
dashboard.description: Vitalstatistix, making sure everything runs correctly
dashboard.searchTemplate: | inputlookup serverinfo | search SERVER_STATUS!=retired | appendcols [| rest /services/data/indexes | search assureUTF8=0 "eai:acl.app"=druid_utils | fields title | eval recent_{title}=0 | eval count_{title}=0 | stats sum(recent_*) AS recent_* sum(count_*) AS count_*] | streamstats sum(recent_*) AS recent_* sum(count_*) AS count_* | join type=outer max=0 HOST [| rest /services/data/indexes | search assureUTF8=0 "eai:acl.app"=druid_utils | map search="| metadata index=$$title$$ type=hosts | rename host AS HOST recentTime AS recent_$$title$$ totalCount AS count_$$title$$ | eval indexes=\"$$title$$\" | fields HOST recent_* count_*"] | stats first(TSMSERVER) AS TSMSERVER sum(recent_*) AS recent_* sum(count_*) AS count_* by HOST | rename HOST AS Host TSMSERVER AS "TSM Server"

table.searchPostProcess: fields "TSM Server" Host recent_tsmdb recent_tsmlogs recent_lemon recent_tsm-accnt | foreach recent_* [eval "<<MATCHSTR>>"=if('<<FIELD>>'>0, strftime('<<FIELD>>', "%F %T"), "") ] | fields - count_* recent_* | sort Host | table "TSM Server" Host *

table.searchString: index=* | stats sparkline(count) AS Frequency latest(_time) AS "Latest event" by host | eval "Latest event"=strftime('Latest event', "%F %T") | rename host AS Host | sort Host

panel.title: Latest TSMDB Events by Type and Host

table.searchString: index=tsmdb | stats latest(_time) AS l by sourcetype tsmserver | chart limit=0 last(l) over sourcetype by tsmserver | join type=outer sourcetype [ | inputlookup tsmdb | search frequency!=NEVER | eval sourcetype=internal_name+"-"+version | fields sourcetype frequency name ] | stats first(frequency) AS Frequency max(TSM*) AS TSM* by name | foreach TSM* [eval "TSM<<MATCHSTR>>"=Frequency+":"+if(isnotnull(<<FIELD>>), <<FIELD>>, "")] | rename name AS Type | sort Type | table Type Frequency *

table.searchPostProcess: fields - count_alerts | foreach count_* [rename <<FIELD>> AS "<<MATCHSTR>>"] | fields - recent_* | sort Host | table "TSM Server" Host * | addcoltotals label="Totals" labelfield="TSM Server"
